command.name: allocreator
command.description:
Description: an asset allocation tool to view, manage, track, evaluate, benchmark, rank, optimize, or create investment portfolios of stocks, etfs, and mutual funds.
Type 'allocreator <command> -h' to show help and see more examples for the specified command.
Examples: allocreator import-trans -a1 allocreator import-trans --file=transactions.csv allocreator import-xray -fxray.csv -s24 allocreator update allocreator populate allocreator populate -s'2 months ago' -e12/20/08 allocreator populate -s'last week' -tIBM,MRK allocreator populate -e5-4-2000

option.name: quiet
option.description: supress verbose output

option.name: debug
option.description: enable debug mode: display the options and arguments passed

option.name: variable
option.description: enable variable mode: display the value of all program variables

option.name: test
option.description: enables test mode, prints actions to the screen without performing them

command.name: import-trans
command.description: import transactions downloaded from your brokerage account (accepts csv files)

option.name: file
option.description: csv file name to import, defaults to transaction_new.csv

option.name: account
option.description: account-id # for the tranasaction, defaults to 1

option.name: file
option.description: csv file name to import, defaults to security_xray_new.csv

option.name: security
option.description: security-id # for the xray into, defaults to 1

command.name: update
command.description: update databse with current market info

option.name: force
option.description: force database update

option.name: tickers
option.description: comma seperated list of tickers to get quotes for, defaults to all tickers in database

command.name: populate
command.description: populate database with historical market prices (historical entries already exsiting in database will not be added)

option.name: start
option.description: population start date, defaults to last entry date per security (or 'last year' if there are no entries)

option.name: end
option.description: population end date, defaults to 'today'

option.name: force
option.description: force exsiting entries to be overwritten

option.name: tickers
option.description: comma seperated list of tickers to get quotes for, defaults to all tickers in database

command.name: quote
command.description: retrieve quotes for securities, accounts, or portfolios in database (current as of last database update)

option.name: update
option.description: update database before returning quote

option.name: mode
option.description: quote retrieval mode: 1 = securities, 2 = accounts, 3 = portfolios; defaults to 1

option.name: date
option.description: quote date, defaults to 'today'

option.name: tickers
option.description: comma seperated list of tickers (account/portfolio names) to get quotes for, defaults to all tickers (accounts/portfolios) in database

command.name: list
command.description: show listing of all securities, accounts, or portfolios in database

option.name: mode
option.description: list retrieval mode: 1 = securities, 2 = accounts, 3 = portfolios; defaults to 1

option.name: tickers
option.description: comma seperated list of tickers (account/portfolio names) to show, defaults to all tickers (accounts/portfolios) in database

command.name: sreport
command.description: retrieve status report for accounts or portfolios in database (current as of last database update)

option.name: update
option.description: update database before displaying report

option.name: mode
option.description: report retrieval mode: 1 = accounts, 2 = portfolios; defaults to 1

option.name: date
option.description: report date, defaults to 'today'

option.name: names
option.description: comma seperated list of account (portfolio) names to get reports for, defaults to first account (portfolio) in database

command.name: plreport
command.description: retrieve profit/loss report for accounts or portfolios in database (current as of last database update)

option.name: update
option.description: update database before displaying report

option.name: mode
option.description: report retrieval mode: 1 = accounts, 2 = portfolios; defaults to 1

option.name: start
option.description: report start date, defaults to 'last year'

option.name: end
option.description: report end date, defaults to 'today'

option.name: range
option.description: report date range (use as replacement for -s and -e options), accepts values such as 'YTD', 'last 3 months', 'MTD', 'last year'...

option.name: names
option.description: comma seperated list of account (portfolio) names to get reports for, defaults to first account (portfolio) in database
